title: Research
text:
Trade-Offs from Regulatory Discretion: The Role of Political Appointments
Regulating Moral Hazard in Third-Party Vehicle Inspections: California Smog Check
Do Firms Avoid Pollution? Water Pollution and Beverage Manufacturers’ Location

title: Yun-Ting Yeh
text:
Ph.D. Candidate
University of Arizona
 Tucson, AZ


Welcome!
I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at the University of Arizona.
My research interests are in environmental and energy economics and empirical industrial organization. My current work studies regulatory discretion in water quality enforcement.
I received my M.A. in Economics from the University of Tokyo, B.A. in Economics from National Taiwan University, and B.B.A. in Business Economics from City University of Hong Kong.
You can contact me at yyeh@arizona.edu.
